correlation_analysis package¶

Submodules¶

correlation_analysis.analysis module¶

correlation_analysis.analysis.get_industry_correlation_result(data: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, industry_symbol_map: Dict[str, List[str]], output_file_path: str) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶

获取与行业相关的相关系数

参数

  • data (DataFrame) – 变量,index是交易日期,columns是品种,data是变量值

  • industry_symbol_map (Dict[str, List[str]]) – 行业中的品种字典

  • output_file_path (str) – 输出路径

返回

返回类型

None

correlation_analysis.analysis.get_period_industry_correlation_result(price_df: pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, industry_symbol_map: Dict[str, List[str]], output_file_path: str, period: int = 20) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame¶
